snippet: YouTube, now carrying more polished output, will announce more original channels to the 100 it has introduced in the last year.
abstract: Google's YouTube, now carrying more polished output, will add more than 50 original channels to the 100 it has introduced in the last year; free channels will carry advertising, but are not seen as replacing television soon, whether for viewers, content makers or advertisers.
lead_paragraph: YouTube, now carrying more polished output, will announce more original channels to the 100 it has introduced in the last year.

headline.main: YouTube to Serve Niche Tastes by Adding Channels
